pull.title: docs: Update OpenBSD build instructions for OpenBSD 6.3
pull.body: Update OpenBSD build instructions for OpenBSD 6.3.

events.message: docs: Update OpenBSD build instructions for OpenBSD 6.3

events.body: utACK 1680b8b, this is just making the documentation more verbose.

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master
issue.body:
build: split warnings out of CXXFLAGS
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13306

docs: Update OpenBSD build instructions for OpenBSD 6.3
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13295

qa: Initialize lockstack to prevent null pointer deref
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13300

Qt: use [default wallet] as name for wallet with no name
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13275

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -12,11 +12,10 @@ Preparation
 Run the following as root to install the base dependencies for building:
 
 ```bash
-pkg_add git gmake libevent libtool
-pkg_add autoconf # (select highest version, e.g. 2.69)
-pkg_add automake # (select highest version, e.g. 1.15)
-pkg_add python # (select highest version, e.g. 3.6)
-pkg_add boost
+pkg_add git gmake libevent libtool boost
comments.body: I don't think we need to specify minor/patch versions here. They are just more numbers that will quickly go "out of date"
